info.title: Jentic Generated Arazzo Specification
info.description: Automatically generated Arazzo specification from OpenAPI

workflows.summary: Search for recipes based on various criteria (keywords, diet, cuisine, etc.) and then retrieve detailed information, including ingredients and instructions, for a selected recipe.
workflows.description: Search for recipes based on various criteria (keywords, diet, cuisine, etc.) and then retrieve detailed information, including ingredients and instructions, for a selected recipe.

steps.description: Search for recipes using keywords, dietary restrictions, cuisine types, and nutritional filters.
Retrieve full details for a specific recipe identified by its ID, including ingredients, instructions, nutrition, and servings.

workflows.summary: Connect a user, generate a meal plan based on their preferences (e.g., daily calories, diet), and then create a shopping list for that plan.
workflows.description: Connect a user, generate a meal plan based on their preferences (e.g., daily calories, diet), and then create a shopping list for that plan.

steps.description: Connect the application user to a spoonacular user account to enable personalized features.
Generate a daily or weekly meal plan based on target calories, diet, and exclusions.
Add a specific recipe (from generated plan or elsewhere) to the user's meal plan for a specific date and slot.
Generate a shopping list based on the user's meal plan for a specified date range.

workflows.summary: Allows users to find recipes they can make based on ingredients they already have, minimizing food waste and suggesting cooking ideas.
workflows.description: Allows users to find recipes they can make based on ingredients they already have, minimizing food waste and suggesting cooking ideas.

steps.description: Search for recipes that maximize the use of provided ingredients or minimize missing ingredients.
Retrieve full details for a chosen recipe found by ingredients.
Get step-by-step instructions with associated ingredients and equipment for the chosen recipe.

workflows.summary: Find a recipe and get its detailed nutritional breakdown, including macro and micro nutrients.
workflows.description: Find a recipe and get its detailed nutritional breakdown, including macro and micro nutrients.

steps.description: Search for recipes, optionally requesting nutritional info in the search results.
Retrieve detailed nutritional information (calories, carbs, fat, protein, good/bad nutrients) for a specific recipe ID.

workflows.summary: Search for an ingredient, get its details (nutrition, aisle), and find potential substitutes.
workflows.description: Search for an ingredient, get its details (nutrition, aisle), and find potential substitutes.

steps.description: Search for a simple whole food ingredient.
Retrieve detailed information for the found ingredient ID.
Find substitutes for the ingredient using its ID.

workflows.summary: Find a recipe, extract its ingredients, and map those ingredients to specific grocery products available for purchase.
workflows.description: Find a recipe, extract its ingredients, and map those ingredients to specific grocery products available for purchase.

steps.description: Search for recipes.
Retrieve the full details of the selected recipe, focusing on the ingredient list.
Map the recipe's ingredients to purchasable grocery products.

workflows.summary: Find a recipe, determine its characteristics (e.g., main ingredient, cuisine), get general wine pairing suggestions, and then find specific wine product recommendations.
workflows.description: Find a recipe, determine its characteristics (e.g., main ingredient, cuisine), get general wine pairing suggestions, and then find specific wine product recommendations.

steps.description: Search for a recipe.
Retrieve full details for the selected recipe to understand its main components.
Get wine pairing suggestions based on the recipe's title or main ingredient.
Get specific product recommendations for one of the suggested wine types.

workflows.summary: Extract recipe details (ingredients, instructions, title) from a given URL, then get further analysis like nutrition and step-by-step instructions.
workflows.description: Extract recipe details (ingredients, instructions, title) from a given URL, then get further analysis like nutrition and step-by-step instructions.

steps.description: Extract structured recipe data from a webpage URL.
Get a detailed breakdown of the extracted recipe's instructions.

workflows.summary: Find a recipe and then discover other recipes that are similar to it.
workflows.description: Find a recipe and then discover other recipes that are similar to it.

steps.description: Search for an initial recipe.
Find recipes similar to the one selected from the search results.
Get the details of one of the similar recipes found.

workflows.summary: Search for a specific grocery product by its UPC code, retrieve its information, and find comparable products.
workflows.description: Search for a specific grocery product by its UPC code, retrieve its information, and find comparable products.

steps.description: Find a grocery product using its UPC.
Find products comparable to the one found by UPC, based on nutrition, price, etc.

workflows.summary: Search for a menu item from a restaurant chain and retrieve its nutritional information.
workflows.description: Search for a menu item from a restaurant chain and retrieve its nutritional information.

steps.description: Search for menu items by query, restaurant, or nutritional filters.
Retrieve detailed information, including nutrition, for a specific menu item ID.
